TypeSignature.Value: public delegate System.Threading.Tasks.Task<Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Auth.NewTokenAndFrequency> RenewTokenFuncAsync(object state, CancellationToken cancellationToken);
.class public auto ansi sealed RenewTokenFuncAsync extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function RenewTokenFuncAsync(state As Object, cancellationToken As CancellationToken) As Task(Of NewTokenAndFrequency)
type RenewTokenFuncAsync = delegate of obj * CancellationToken -> Task<NewTokenAndFrequency>

Docs.param: A state object, which can be of any type.
A cancellation token to receive the cancellation signal.
Docs.summary: This type of delegate is used to update the token credential periodically.
